message: Let's split it evenly to start with!
You can have the smaller share, I'll take the majority!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not too big!
You're getting desperate, take the crumbs!
Let's meet in the middle, but I'm not giving in too much
You're running out of time, take the last crumbs!
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, take the almost nothing!
I'll give you almost everything, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, take the scraps!
I'll give you almost everything, I'm almost out of options!
You're out of options, take the last penny!
